# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those looking for top-quality solutions. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $95. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your interest and potential for maximizing the product's full capabilities. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
